helper

Class GameFolderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.GameFolderHelper

  • public abstract class GameFolderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    GameFolderHelper is a helper class to get the absolute path of a relative path within a gamefolder. Also the gamefolder of an relative path within a gamefolder can be determined.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameFolderHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getAbsolutePath(java.lang.String path)
      Returns the absolute path of the path.
      static java.lang.String getGameFolder(Game game)
      Returns the absolute path of the gamefolder from the Game.
      static java.lang.String getGameFolder(java.lang.String path)
      Returns the absolute path of the gamefolder holding the relative path path.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • GameFolderHelper

        public GameFolderHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getAbsolutePath

        public static java.lang.String getAbsolutePath(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the absolute path of the path. path is given as a relative path within a gamefolder.
        Parameters:
        path - relative path within a gamefolder
        Returns:
        absolute path of the path
        Since:
        1.0

      • getGameFolder

        public static java.lang.String getGameFolder(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the absolute path of the gamefolder holding the relative path path.
        Parameters:
        path - relative path within a gamefolder
        Returns:
        absolute path of the gamefolder
        Since:
        1.0

      • getGameFolder

        public static java.lang.String getGameFolder(Game game)
        Returns the absolute path of the gamefolder from the Game.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to get the gamefolder
        Returns:
        absolute path of the gamefolder from the game
        Since:
        1.0
